page.title: 06Traffic and Amenities Census
page.content: Alsager has one main road the B5077 leading to Crewe and Stoke-on-Trent.A traffic census was carried out in the centre of Alsager at 8.15 a.m. The main flow in the morning was going to and from Crewe and Stoke. Another census was carried out at 4.30 p.m. The main flow was going to Stoke,in other words the traffic in the morning was going to work,and in the evening it was coming home.There were many more cars in the morning.A questionnaire was also carried out about the amenities in Alsager.The majority of people interviewed lived in the area and reached the shops by walking.Most peoples'husbands worked outside Alsager.Most people shop in Alsager daily for foodstuffs.People said that Alsager needs more entertainment for teenagers. By S.Rogers,V.Clarke,S.Holdway.Form1SH
